WorkItem.ClosedComment: Found the problem: you are crit capped due to lack of hit.If you'd never glance or miss your white hits would crit 73.3% of the time, but as you have 24% glancing and 14.6% missed you only connect with the mob 61.4% of the time.Getting more hit can get this percentage up to 76% at which point it can't be improved any further.
WorkItem.Description:
I optimized my available gear and I'm sitting at the poison hit cap (210 rating with Draenei + 5/5 precision + Misery) (well, 1 hit rating above it actually) and expertise capped (with a gem or two) and now the problem is that Rawr tells me to gem hit, go for items with hit etc. way more than I should. I'm running the latest version of Rawr (2.3.18)
My armory: http://eu.wowarmory.com/character-sheet.xml?r=Stormreaver&cn=Skillpadde
And attached is my character file.

Comments.Message: Thanks Alensia, I'm going to look into this.
